TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit BitConverter extends System.Object
public ref class BitConverter abstract sealed

summary.span: 將基底資料類型與位元組陣列相互轉換。

span.span: Converts base data types to an array of bytes, and an array of bytes to base data types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 類別可協助管理實值型別，其基本形式，為一系列的位元組。The class helps manipulate value types in their fundamental form, as a series of bytes. 一個位元組會定義為 8 位元不帶正負號整數。A byte is defined as an 8-bit unsigned integer. 類別包含靜態方法，將每個基本類型與位元組陣列，從下表所示。The class includes static methods to convert each of the primitive types to and from an array of bytes, as the following table illustrates. |類型Type|位元組轉換成To byte conversion|從位元組轉換From byte conversion| |----------|------------------------|--------------------------| |||| |||| ||

-或--or-

|

-或--or-

| |||| |||| |||| |||| |||| |||| |||| 如果您使用方法，以反覆存取的資料，請確定多載，而`To`*類型*方法指定相同的型別。If you use methods to round-trip data, make sure that the overload and the `To`*Type* method specify the same type. 下列範例所示，還原陣列，表示帶正負號的整數，藉由呼叫方法可能會導致與原始版本不同的值。As the following example illustrates, restoring an array that represents a signed integer by calling the method can result in a value that is different from the original. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱文章[使用帶正負號的非十進位和位元值](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186999)BCL Team 部落格中。For more information, see the entry [Working with Signed Non-Decimal and Bitwise Values](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=186999) in the BCL Team Blog. [!code-csharp[System.BitConverter.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/CS/example1.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.BitConverter.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/VB/example1.vb#3)] 所傳回的陣列中的位元組順序方法多載 (以及中傳回的整數的位元順序方法和所傳回的十六進位字串的順序方法) 而定由小到大或 big endian 電腦架構。The order of bytes in the array returned by the method overloads (as well as the order of bits in the integer returned by the method and the order of hexadecimal strings returned by the method) depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian. 同樣地，位元組陣列中的順序，並由傳回`To` *IntegerValue*方法和方法，取決於電腦架構是位元組由小到大或位元組由大到小。Similarly, the order of bytes in the array and returned by the `To`*IntegerValue* methods and the method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian. 架構的位元組序由屬性，會傳回`true`由小到大系統上和`false`big endian 系統上。The endianness of an architecture is indicated by the property, which returns `true` on little-endian systems and `false` on big-endian systems. 由小到大在系統上，低序位位元組會在較高序位位元組。On little-endian systems, lower-order bytes precede higher-order bytes. Big endian 系統上較高序位位元組會優先低序位位元組。On big-endian system, higher-order bytes precede lower-order bytes. 下表會說明其間的差異所導致的傳遞整數 1,234,567,890 (0x499602D2) 位元組陣列中以方法。The following table illustrates the difference in the byte arrays that result from passing the integer 1,234,567,890 (0x499602D2) to the method. 位元組會從索引 0 處的位元組的位元組，位於索引 3 的順序列出。The bytes are listed in order from the byte at index 0 to the byte at index 3. ||| |-|-| |位元組由小到大Little-endian|D2-02-96-49D2-02-96-49| |Big endianBig-endian|49-96-02-D249-96-02-D2| 因為某些方法的傳回值需視系統架構而定，務必小心傳輸機器界限之外的位元組資料：Because the return value of some methods depends on system architecture, be careful when transmitting byte data beyond machine boundaries: - 如果傳送和接收資料的所有系統都一定會有相同的位元組序，不具有資料執行。If all systems sending and receiving data are guaranteed to have the same endianness, nothing has be done to the data. - 如果傳送和接收資料的系統可以有不同的位元組序，一律會傳輸以特定順序的資料。If systems sending and receiving data can have different endianness, always transmit data in a particular order. 這表示位元組陣列中的順序可能必須再傳送或接收它們後回復。This means that the order of bytes in the array may have to be reversed either before sending them or after receiving them. 常見的慣例是以網路位元組順序 （位元組由大到小順序） 的資料傳輸。A common convention is to transmit data in network byte order (big-endian order). 下列範例會提供實作傳送以網路位元組順序的整數值。The following example provides an implementation for sending an integer value in network byte order. [!code-csharp[System.BitConverter.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/CS/networkorder1.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.BitConverter.Class#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/VB/networkorder1.vb#4)] - 如果可以傳送和接收資料的系統有 endianness 不同的電腦和資料傳輸包含帶正負號的整數，請呼叫方法，將資料轉換為網路位元組順序和方法將它轉換成所需的順序收件者。If systems sending and receiving data can have different endianness and the data to be transmitted consists of signed integers, call the method to convert the data to network byte order and the method to convert it to the order required by the recipient. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例說明如何使用數個類別方法。The following code example illustrates the use of several class methods. [!code-cpp[System.BitConverter.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/CPP/bitconv.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.BitConverter.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/CS/bitconv.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.BitConverter.Class#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.BitConverter.Class/VB/bitconv.vb#1)]

summary.span: 將指定的雙精確度浮點數轉換為 64 位元帶正負號的整數。

span.span: Converts the specified double-precision floating point number to a 64-bit signed integer.

returns.span: 64 位元帶正負號之整數的值等於 。

span.span: A 64-bit signed integer whose value is equivalent to .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 中傳回的整數的位元順序方法，取決於電腦架構是位元組由小到大或位元組由大到小。The order of bits in the integer returned by the method depends on whether the computer architecture is little-endian or big-endian. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會將轉換的位元模式，數個值來值與`DoubleToInt64Bits`方法。The following code example converts the bit patterns of several values to values with the `DoubleToInt64Bits` method. summary.span: 指出資料儲存在此電腦架構中的位元組順序 (字節順序)。

span.span: Indicates the byte order ("endianness") in which data is stored in this computer architecture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不同的電腦架構存放區使用不同的位元組順序的資料。Different computer architectures store data using different byte orders. "Big-endian"表示最大顯著性位元組文字的左邊。"Big-endian" means the most significant byte is on the left end of a word. "Little endian"表示最大顯著性位元組上右端的文字。"Little-endian" means the most significant byte is on the right end of a word. > [!NOTE] > 您可以從網路位元組順序為主機電腦的位元組順序不需要將轉換擷取的值欄位，方法是傳遞到 16 位元、 32 位元或 64 位元整數方法。You can convert from network byte order to the byte order of the host computer without retrieving the value of the field by passing a 16-bit, 32-bit, or 64 bit integer to the method. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何將`IsLittleEndian`欄位。The following code example illustrates the use of the `IsLittleEndian` field.
